data.name: For The Battle
data.detailed_description:
2d online platformer fighting game where you should choose your playstyle and combine abilities in order to find a way to dominate your opponents in the PvP arena.

The Rules Are Simple:
Arrow Keys - to Move
Z,X,C - to Use Attached Ability
A - to show spawn map

Features:
- Up to 10 players
- Server List
- Tutorial

Go chilling off with your friends in the custom lobbies, or join the public ones.
Competitive and Titanic game modes constantly change the map and create a dynamic gameplay.

So, what are you waiting for? get your favorite skin with abilities and go jumping around in the arena!

data.short_description: 2d online platformer fighting game where you should choose your playstyle and combine abilities in order to find a way to dominate your opponents in the PvP arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Or Later
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standart
